game.toast_not_whitelisted: You can only add players who put you onto their friendlist.
game.cannot_add_guest_if_tournament: Only registered users can join a tournament game!
game.toast_error_user_has_active_game: This player already has an active game, To be able to participate, please finish or delete this game first.
game.hint_guest_unranked: Games with guests will not be ranked!
game.toast_tourney_requirements: All players must be registered to the tournament.

login.accept_terms: With the registration you accept the
login.reset_sent: We have sent you a link to reset your password.
login.user_not_found: No user with this email found
login.register_error_password_length: Password must be at least 6 characters

profile.name: Name
profile.toast_userAlreadyOnWhiteListError: Player is already on your list

statistics.explainer_tichuAnnouncedWhen1stRate: How many of the games you were 1st did you call Tichu
statistics.explainer_tichuMaster: Points out of Tichus per round
statistics.explainer_elo: Rating according to the ELO system

tournaments.create_explainer: You will get a tournament password, which you and others can use to sign up.
tournaments.leave_tournament_message: If you leave the tournament, your games will no longer count towards the tournament stats. You can always rejoin the tournament if you remember the password.
tournaments.error_could_not_joing: Could not join! Make sure the password is correct and the tournament is active.
tournaments.sign_up_explainer: Sign up for a tournament to get real-time stats. You can only join if the tournament admin has set it to active.
tournaments.explainer_0: On vacation with your Tichu friends? Playing a little tournament on a Sunday? Then this is for you!
tournaments.explainer_1: Create a tournament below and let others join with a password
tournaments.explainer_2: Play games with people who already signed up for your tournament
tournaments.explainer_3: See stats limited to all games played in this tournament
tournaments.title: New Tournament Mode!

welcome.explainer_1: Your ranking is calculated with the ELO system. You start with 1000 points. Your ranking increases when you win and decreases when you lose.
welcome.explainer_2: Games only count towards your stats if there are four registered users in it, i.e. no guest.
welcome.explainer_3: Before you can add players to a game, they have to add you to their friendlist.
welcome.delete_alert_message: You can send a request to delete a game.
welcome.explainer_4: Once you have played 100 hands (which is approximately 10 games) we will rank your stats and you can compare your results to other players.
welcome.winningStreak_description: Win X Games in a row
welcome.playXGamesInOneMonth_description: Play X Games in one Month
welcome.tournament_achievement_description: You are an outstanding Tichu Player

general.offline_content: Please verify your connection and try again.
